name: The Scent Remained
title: Xingqiu: The Scent Remained
desc: His penmanship leaves quite the impression.
inPlayDescription: When your Xingqiu has this card equipped, the <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Rain Sword created can block DMG of at least 2 and its starting <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) +1.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Xingqiu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Xingqiu, equip this card.After Xingqiu equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Fatal Rainscreen once.When your Xingqiu has this card equipped, the <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Rain Sword created can block DMG of at least 2 and its starting <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) +1.(You must have Xingqiu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
